assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Asahi Rubber Inc. manufactures and sells industrial rubber products in Japan. The company provides ASA COLOR light emitting diodes (LED) for use in automotive interiors, such as speedometers, navigation controls, switches, and audios; silicone lens for UV LEDs; and white silicon ink for ultraviolet applications, as well as color filter sheets. It also offers Light diffusion cap; ASA COLOR application products, such as lamp cap for automotive interior lighting, and phosphor sheet/tube; and bendable electric generators, as well as stretchable cables. In addition, the company provides rubber membrane for automotive switches; hydrophilic silicone rubber for use in fluid management devices, hydrophilic film replacement, and materials for cell culturing container; high precision rubber sheets; and gaskets for prefilled syringes. Further, it offers one-way check valve for gravity drip; rubber products for use in medical care, such as rubber plugs for infusion bags and vacuum blood collection tubes, or chemical injected rubber plugs; electromagnetic wave control body, a pseudo-human body for measuring how electromagnetic waves in a communication environment; microfluidic devices; 3D solutions; flexible thermoplastic modules; energy harvesting; stretchable cables, as well as provide products for wind turbine blades. Additionally, the company provides Saporous, which is used as hip protectors and headgears for care goods, various insoles, arch point insoles, and earplugs for swimming; O-rings for use in waterproof power-operated parts of door mirrors and knock sensors of automobiles; and rubber for table tennis rackets. Asahi Rubber Inc. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Saitama, Japan.

companyOfficers.name: Nobuyuki  Hori
